settings.title: When can I visit?
settings.text:
We’re open for purchases online 24/7 & our physical store is open for hire, sales & "click & collect" as follows:

  • Mon – Tue : 11am – 7pm  - HIRE FLOOR CLOSED to new hires (unless your event is Mon/Tues)
  • Wed:            11 am - 7pm
  • Thurs:          11am – 8pm
  • Fri:               11am – 6pm
  • Sat:              10am – 4pm
  • CLOSED:      Sundays & public holidays

settings.title: Why is your hire floor closed on Mondays & Tuesdays?
settings.text: Our hire floor has always been closed to new enquiries on Mondays - many costumes are out of the store & we don't have hire floor staff available until the evening when they're elbow deep in soap suds washing costumes & disinfecting accessories.  Covid has caused us to tighten our operations.  Tuesday staff will now be 100% deciated to steaming, ironing & accessories cleaning, prior to reopening the wardrobe in tip top shape on Wednesdays.

settings.title: What's the BEST day to visit if I want to hire rather than buy a costume, for a future date?
settings.text:
Wednesday or Thursday is best if you're planning ahead for a future event & don't need to take your costume away on the spot.  The hire floor is closed to new enquiries Monday/Tuesday & our busiest days are Friday/Saturday, where many costumes will already be out of the wardrobe for weekend events.  Of course, you're welcome upstairs any day Wed-Sat - you're just going to get the widest selection available on Wed/Thurs.  

If you can only make it in on Fri-Sat, don't worry!  Our range is massive across both upstairs hire & downstairs retail - you won't be leaving empty handed!

SO - what are you waiting for?  Come pay us a visit!  We've even been known to pass around a cheeky champers or two during the festive season (sshh!)

settings.title: So Where's Wally, exactly?
settings.text: 388 Pacific Highway, Crows Nest, Sydney.  That's bang on the highway, opposite the site of the new Crows Nest train station.  The nearest cross street is Hume Street.

settings.title: Where's the best place to park?
settings.text: Score free parking on Nicholson St directly behind us (1 hr onstreet / 2 hrs council carpark), or Hume St council carpark.  Metred parking on highway (avoid clearway weekdays 3 - 7pm).

settings.title: Can I bus or train it to you?
settings.text: We're only 5 mins walk from St Leonards train station & buses run regularly along the highway.

settings.title: How much is Shipping?
settings.text:
• Standard shipping:  FREE for orders over $99, otherwise $9.95 flat-rate Australia wide
  • Express shipping:  $16.95 

Note, all Online Only stock shipped directly from our suppliers ships Express.  If your order includes both Instore & Online Only items, your order will ship Express.

settings.accordion_text: We're committed to making your party preparations as enjoyable as the party itself.  We've got stylists instore, we're FULL OF IT (great ideas, that is), plus you get to see & try before your hire or buy.  Come on down!

settings.title: Join the Party!
settings.text: Sign-up for exclusive offers, sales & event alerts.
